name: 2.Technical Overview
content:
Key Functionalities:

  • Data Ingestion: Reads data from a CSV file.
  • Data Preparation: Cleans and prepares data, engineers features, and analyzes correlations.
  • Model Building: Users select features and methods (Random Forest, Decision Tree, etc.) for building predictive models.
  • Model Evaluation: Evaluates models based on metrics like MAPE, R2, etc., and validates using configurable parameters.
  • Prediction: Uses the best model for weekly sales predictions, providing insights for business decisions.


Technical Goals:

  • Optimization:
  • Use machine learning models to optimize product pricing for Retail.
  • Data-Driven Insights:
  • Provide actionable insights based on data analysis and predictive modeling.
  • Model Evaluation:
  • Select the best model based on loss metrics such as MAPE and R2.
  • User Configurations:
  • Allow users to configure model features, methods, and validation parameters.
